script:
1). How did you get to work today?
My car broke down.
About 8 o'clock
I took the bus. 
2). Weren't you going to Boston this week?
You weren't going this week.
I was, but my trip was postponed. 
Yes, we'll go next week.
3). What did you do in Paris?
Mostly, we went sightseeing. 
We went last month.
It was a lot of fun.
